sentences.en: I left eventually at six o'clock feeling utterly dispirited and depressed.
sentences.cn: 我一直到6点才极度沮丧和郁闷地离去。

sentences.en: No-one knows where they stand with him; he is utterly unpredictable.
sentences.cn: 谁也不知道他怎样看待他们；他是个完全不可捉摸的人。

sentences.en: She bloomed into an utterly beautiful creature.
She was utterly feminine and devastatingly attractive in an unstudied way.
sentences.cn: 她温存无比,魅力四射而又绝不矫揉造作.

sentences.en: The damage it would cause makes the idea utterly impracticable.
sentences.cn: 这个想法可能造成损害,以致根本不能采纳.

sentences.en: The new laws coming in are utterly ridiculous.
sentences.cn: 新颁布的法律荒唐至极。

sentences.en: The ship's crew were now exhausted and utterly demoralized.
sentences.cn: 这艘船上的船员现在都已精疲力竭，彻底丧失了信心。

sentences.en: The way she behaved towards him was utterly ruthless.
sentences.cn: 她对待他真是无情至极。

sentences.en: Tom was utterly indiscreet, and could never keep a secret.
sentences.cn: 汤姆言语很不谨慎，什么时候也别想他守住秘密。

sentences.en: Utterly devoted to the people, he gave his life in saving his patients.
sentences.cn: 他忠于人民, 把毕生精力用于挽救患者的生命.

sentences.en: When he was depressed, he felt utterly divorced from reality.
sentences.cn: 他心情沮丧时就感到完全脱离了现实.

sentences.en: You couldn't be more mistaken, Alex. You've utterly misread the situation.
sentences.cn: 亚历克斯，你真是大错特错，你对局势的判断根本不对。

words.tran_cn: 完全的；彻底的；无条件的
完全地；绝对地；全然地；彻底地，十足地

trans.tran_cn: 全然，完全地，彻底地，绝对的，十足地，十分
trans.tran_en: completely – used especially to emphasize that something is very bad, or that a feeling is very strong
